review: this thing is great! easy set up and moves from tv to tv easily. got more on my list!
author: stacie

review: Really enjoying this fire stick great item
author: Sheila A DelVal

review: I was very disappointed with the Fire TV Stick.I bought it to use for traveling and to watch in hotel rooms. You can not sign-in to hotel wifi because you can not access a web browser which is required to log-in to hotel wifi before connecting the Fire TV Stick.Also, I subscribe to HBO and Showtime on my Comcast/Xfinity cable, but it's not available on the Fire TV Stick.This is something that should be mentioned in the product description, as this would have been a deal-breaker for me.This product is basically worthless to me.Though I am a big fan and faithful customer of Amazon's for the past 10 years .... they dropped the ball ... big time ... with this product.
author: Ed Lohrer e3_prog "progressive music fan"

review: I am enjoying my fire stick. The only problem I am having is when I go on HULU it continues to buffer.
author: Rosemarie Hudson

review: It is so easy to use. Plugged it in and away it went. Was so happy with it.
author: Lachelle Yoder

review: The overall experience it's a bit slow if you are used to other streaming devices like the Apple TV. The menus also are not as clean, but overall it does it's job. I would not buy another one though.
author: Matteo

review: Wish I could access the internet to stream online if not would be a five star product.
author: Daniel macias

review: The Fire Stick is absolutely wonderful. It is a perfect addition and easy to navigate. Thank you Amazon for another fantastic product.
author: ciellalv

review: I'm enjoying the Fire TV stick and Amazon Prime Videos. It's easy for me to use.
author: J. W. Carney "Sewing Fun"
